alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 10:42AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Bay, eastern Walton, southwestern Holmes and southwestern Washington Counties through 1115 AM EDT/1015 AM CDT/... At 1041 AM EDT/941 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near De Funiak Springs to 12 miles northwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Ebro, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Bruce, Red Head, Eucheeanna, Millers Ferry, Pleasant Hill, Pine Log, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge and Knox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
